name: Focalboard - Board Creation, Views, Card Management, Calendar and Settings
description: Verify login functionality, board creation from templates, Kanban board view operations, table view with calculations, calendar view navigation and date-based card management, card property editing, filtering, sorting, searching, and settings access
steps: Navigate to the Focalboard app at http://localhost:8088/
Verify the login page loads showing a 'Log in' heading, a username field, a password field, a 'Log in' button, and a 'create an account' link
Enter 'wronguser' in the username field and 'wrongpass' in the password field, then click 'Log in'
Verify the login fails and an error message about incorrect login is displayed
Clear the fields, enter 'admin' in the username field and 'admin12345678' in the password field, then click 'Log in'
Verify the dashboard loads showing a 'Create a board' heading, a list of templates including 'Project Tasks', 'Content Calendar', 'Personal Tasks', and a 'Create an empty board' button at the bottom
Close the 'what's new' notification dialog if it appears by clicking its close button
Click on the 'Project Tasks' template in the template list
Verify a preview of the template appears on the right side showing a board with columns like 'To Discuss', sample cards, and a 'Use this template' button
Click the 'Use this template' button
Verify a new board named 'Project Tasks' is created and the sidebar shows the board with four views: 'Progress Tracker', 'Project Priorities', 'Task Calendar', and 'Task Overview'
Verify the 'Progress Tracker' Board view is active and displays Kanban columns: 'Not Started', 'In Progress', 'Blocked', 'Completed', and 'Archived'
Verify the 'Not Started' column contains cards including 'Project budget approval', 'Requirements sign-off', and 'Identify dependencies'
Verify the 'In Progress' column contains cards including 'Conduct market analysis' and 'Define project scope'
Click on the 'Project budget approval' card in the 'Not Started' column

Verify the card detail dialog opens showing the title 'Project budget approval', a description section, and properties: Status set to 'Not Started', Priority set to '1. High', Assignee showing 'Empty', Estimated Hours showing '16', Due Date showing 'Empty', Created By showing 'admin', and Date Created with a timestamp
Verify the card has a checklist section with subtask items each having a checkbox, and a comment area at the bottom saying 'Add a comment...'
Click on the Status property value 'Not Started' and change it to 'In Progress'
Verify the Status property now shows 'In Progress'
Click on the 'Due Date' property showing 'Empty' and select today's date from the date picker
Verify the Due Date property now displays today's date
Click the first checkbox in the checklist to mark the first subtask as done
Verify the checkbox appears checked
Close the card detail dialog by clicking the close button
Verify the 'Project budget approval' card has moved from the 'Not Started' column to the 'In Progress' column on the board
Click the '+ New' button at the bottom of the 'Not Started' column
Type 'New Test Card' as the card title and press Enter
Verify the new card 'New Test Card' appears in the 'Not Started' column
Click on the search field in the toolbar that shows 'Search cards' and type 'budget'
Verify only the 'Project budget approval' card is visible and other cards are filtered out
Clear the search field to show all cards again
Click the 'Filter' button in the toolbar and add a filter for Priority equals '1. High'
Verify only cards with High priority are displayed on the board
Remove the filter to show all cards again
Click the 'Sort' button in the toolbar and add a sort by 'Priority'
Verify cards within each column are reordered based on their Priority values
Click the 'Properties' button in the toolbar and toggle off 'Estimated Hours'
Verify the Estimated Hours values are no longer shown on the card previews in the board columns
Click on 'Task Calendar' in the sidebar to switch to the calendar view
Verify the calendar view loads showing the heading 'February 2026', a grid with day headers 'Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat', and date cells for the entire month
Verify the toolbar shows a 'Week' button, a 'Month' button (currently active/pressed), a left arrow, a 'TODAY' button, a right arrow, and a 'Display by: Due Date' dropdown
Verify the 'Project budget approval' card appears on today's date cell since we set its due date to today
Click the right arrow navigation button next to the 'TODAY' button
Verify the calendar heading changes to 'March 2026' and the date grid updates to show March dates
Click the left arrow navigation button
Verify the calendar returns to 'February 2026'
Click the right arrow twice to navigate to 'April 2026'
Verify the 'TODAY' button is now enabled (not disabled)
Click the 'TODAY' button
Verify the calendar returns to 'February 2026' and the 'TODAY' button becomes disabled again
Click the 'Week' button in the calendar toolbar
Verify the calendar switches to a weekly view showing only 7 days for the current week
Click the 'Month' button to switch back to the full month view
Verify the calendar displays the full month grid again with all weeks visible
Click on an empty date cell for February 20, 2026
Verify a new card is created with the Due Date automatically set to February 20, 2026
Click on 'Task Overview' in the sidebar to switch to the table view
Verify the table view loads with column headers: Name, Status, Priority, Date Created, Due Date, Assignee, Created By, and Estimated Hours
Verify all cards are listed as rows in the table with their corresponding property values in each column
Verify the bottom calculation row shows 'Count' for the Name column with the total number of cards and 'Sum' for the Estimated Hours column with the sum of all hours
Click on the Estimated Hours value of the 'Identify dependencies' card and change it from '16' to '24'
Verify the Estimated Hours Sum at the bottom updates to reflect the new total
Click the '+ New' button below the last row in the table to add a new card
Verify a new empty row is added to the table
Click on 'Project Priorities' in the sidebar to switch to the board view grouped by Priority
Verify the board displays columns grouped by Priority: '1. High', '2. Medium', '3. Low', and 'No Priority'
Verify the '1. High' column shows 'Project budget approval' and 'Requirements sign-off' cards
Click on 'Settings' in the bottom of the sidebar
Verify a settings menu appears with options: 'Import', 'Export archive', 'Set language', 'Set theme', and 'Random icons'
Click 'Export archive' from the settings menu
Verify a file download is triggered for the board archive
Click the 'Share' button in the top right of the board header
Verify a share dialog opens with sharing options
Close the share dialog
Click the 'Find boards' area in the sidebar
Verify the 'Find Boards' dialog opens with a search field and instructions to type to find a board
Type 'Project' in the search field
Verify the search results show the 'Project Tasks' board
Press Escape to close the Find Boards dialog
Click on the Focalboard logo menu at the top of the sidebar and log out
Verify the user is redirected back to the login page
